Package model

Class Course

java.lang.Object
model.Course
public class Course extends Object
The Course class perform actions related to the course It contains methods for saving, deleting, sorting and selective returning values

    • saveCourse

      public int saveCourse() throws URISyntaxException
      Saves a new course to a JSON file.
      Returns:
      An integer value indicating the status of the save operation: Copy 1 - Success Copy 0 - Failure Copy -1 - Invalid input fields Copy -2 - Duplicate course title
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if there is an error getting the path to the program file

    • deleteCourse

      public static boolean deleteCourse(String title) throws URISyntaxException
      Deletes a course from the JSON file with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the course to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the success of the delete operation.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if there is an error getting the path to the program file

    • getCoursesByYearAndByTypeForwardSort

      public static String getCoursesByYearAndByTypeForwardSort(int year, String typetype) throws URISyntaxException, ParseException
      Deletes a course from the JSON file with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the course to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the success of the delete operation.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if there is an error getting the path to the program file
      ParseException

    • getCoursesByYearAndByTypeReverseSort

      public static String getCoursesByYearAndByTypeReverseSort(int year, String type) throws URISyntaxException, ParseException
      Gets a JSON string of courses sorted by year and type in ascending order of date, filtered by a specified year and type.
      Parameters:
      year - The year to filter the courses by.
      type - The type of course to filter the courses by.
      Returns:
      A JSON string of courses sorted by year and type in ascending order of date.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if there is an error getting the path to the program file
      ParseException - if there is an error parsing the course date

      Throws:

    • getStr

      public static String getStr(String jsonFile)
      Reads the contents of a text file and returns it as a string.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the text file to read.
      Returns:
      The contents of the text file as a string.

    • setStr

      public static boolean setStr(String jsonFile, String text)
      Writes a string to a text file, replacing its existing contents.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the text file to write to.
      text - The string to write to the text file.
      Returns:
      true if the write operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • getCourseByTitle

      public static String getCourseByTitle(String title) throws URISyntaxException
      Gets the details of a course with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the course to search for.
      Returns:
      A JSON string containing the details of the course, or an empty string if the title is empty or the course is not found.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if there is an error getting the path to the program file.

    • getCoursesTitles

      public static String getCoursesTitles(String json_str)
      Gets a JSON string containing the titles of all courses.
      Parameters:
      json_str - A JSON string containing the details of all courses.
      Returns:
      A JSON string containing the titles of all courses.
